recipesJson.name: mlNikon's S'mores Milkshake
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description:
nice chocolatey milkshake with the yummy taste of S'mores! For this weeks profile on the Mixin Vixens
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gfTRe2MSfY4&feature=youtu.be


If you like what we do and want to support us in a fun, tasty way, check out our one shot line at flavor jungle: 
https://flavorjungle.com/pages/search-results-page?q=mixing+vixens
